CRD_Gale2.synopsis: After the party, this companion is still trying to come down from all the energy, and with a good enough bond it is possible for the player avatar to flirt and unlock a romance option. Gale has been drinking wine, but is not drunk. The wine is mentioned in a few spots, but it shouldn't influence his diction.
CRD_Gale2.how_to_trigger: Recruit Gale to your partyRecon: oe qnight NIGHT_GoblinHunt_TieflingCelebration_1ad8c357-2695-4d5c-b5f9-8b8c07803121Go to camp and chat with him

CRD_Gale3.synopsis: After the party, this companion is still trying to come down from all the energy, and with a good enough bond it is possible for the player avatar to flirt and unlock a romance option. Gale has been drinking wine, but is not drunk - line delivery shouldn't convey this unless expressly indicated in the VO notes. The wine is mentioned in a few spots, but it shouldn't influence his diction.
CRD_Gale3.how_to_trigger: Recruit Gale to your partyRecon: oe qnight NIGHT_GoblinHunt_TieflingCelebration_1ad8c357-2695-4d5c-b5f9-8b8c07803121Go to camp and chat with him

CRD_Laezel.synopsis: After the party, this companion is still trying to come down from all the energy, and with a good enough bond it is possible for the player avatar to flirt and unlock a romance option.
CRD_Laezel.how_to_trigger: Talk to Laezel during Tiefling Celebration

CRD_Shadowheart.synopsis: The party has been celebrating how they saved the tiefling refugees from the goblins. Everyone's in high spirits. The player and Shadowheart reflect a little on events and may find themselves open to flirtation. If their relationship with each other (and the absence of any other partners) allows for it, they may agree to another liaison later in the night - a bonding/romantic one.

CRD_Astarion.synopsis: After the party, Astarion is standing in a corner, bottle of wine in hand, in a bad mood. Everything's too merry for him, not hedonistic enough. But there's the possibility of a little hedonism with the player, if you both agree to meet up for a little 'fun' later in the night. That's a tantilising thought - there might be something to look forward to after all.

CRD_Wyll.synopsis: After the party, this companion is still trying to come down from all the energy, and with a good enough bond it is possible for the player avatar to flirt and unlock a romance option. For Wyll, you cannot romance if you have not learned about Mizora. He is enjoying himself, it would seem, and toasts you as you approach.

CRD_ROM_Gale.synopsis: After the party, this companion is still trying to come down from all the energy, and with a good enough bond it is possible for the player avatar to flirt and unlock a romance option. Gale has been drinking wine, but is not drunk. The wine is mentioned in a few spots, but it shouldn't influence his diction.
CRD_ROM_Gale.how_to_trigger: Recruit Gale to your partyRecon: oe qnight NIGHT_GoblinHunt_TieflingCelebration_1ad8c357-2695-4d5c-b5f9-8b8c07803121Go to camp and chat with him

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA.synopsis: This dialog replaces EA version in Gustav mod!After the goblin hunt celebration party, this companion has made arrangements to get intimate with the player at night. Note: this can only happen if player already knows about Mizora
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA.how_to_trigger: Ctrl-7 for companiondebug book and choose Romance nights, night 1.

CRD_Gale2_3.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_3.text: I've said enough. Let silence do the talking.

CRD_Gale2_4.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_4.text: There's promise in patience, I assure you. Let the night run its course so that we can run ours as well.

CRD_Gale2_36.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_36.text: Enjoy the night. It seems to me full of opportunities.

CRD_Gale2_54.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_54.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gale looks at the player with a big smile and the words are warm and heartfeltNodeContext: You look at the player with a big smile and the words are warm and heartfelt.

CRD_Gale2_55.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_55.text: I thank you for seeking me out. Amid all this merriment I wasn't sure we'd have a chance to speak this evening.

CRD_Gale2_41.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_41.text: Were our bond a little stronger, I might even have shared a moment of magic with you.

CRD_Gale2_48.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_48.text: Alas, our fledgling acquaintanceship has not yet taken flight. Such intimacy will have to wait.

CRD_Gale2_29.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_29.text: I was hoping you'd spare me a moment. There was something rather magical I wished to show you.

CRD_Gale2_16.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale2_16.text: I like the sound of 'magical.' What do you have planned?

CRD_Gale2_14.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_14.text: A lesson. And trust me when I say - few have experienced the pleasure I offer to teach.
CRD_Gale2_14.context: NodeContext: Referring to the spell-teaching scene, but the player doesn't know the specifics. This should sound enticing without sounding creepy

CRD_Gale2_43.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_43.text: However, it's something best experienced in more intimate surrounds, once the revelry has ended, and the stillness of the night has been restored.

CRD_Gale2_12.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_12.text: For now - please, enjoy the celebration. When it is done, I will show you all.

CRD_Gale2_53.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_53.text: As they say in Waterdeep: in wine there is truth.

CRD_Gale2_6.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_6.text: That's usually followed by: in water there is good sense.

CRD_Gale2_40.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_40.text: I promise you - my offer is a perfectly sober one. So, what do you say?

CRD_Gale2_20.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale2_20.text: No thanks, Gale. I'm in no mood for magic this evening.

CRD_Gale2_56.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_56.text: Too bad. One should never be afraid to live life to the fullest.

CRD_Gale2_35.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_35.text: More's the pity you've already found someone else to make merry with, just the two of you.

CRD_Gale2_27.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_27.text: He has a certain charm about him, Astarion. Then again, so does a tiger when it purrs.

CRD_Gale2_60.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_60.text: You might be in for an adventure with Karlach. More than you bargained for - with a bit of luck.

CRD_Gale2_64.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_64.text: Or perhaps more than you bargained for - full stop.

CRD_Gale2_66.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_66.text: Lae'zel. Blade like a razor, wit like a razor, tongue like a razor.

CRD_Gale2_1.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_1.text: I do hope you know what you're doing.

CRD_Gale2_22.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_22.text: Far be it from me of course, to question your tastes.

CRD_Gale2_62.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale2_62.text: What were you going to show me?

CRD_Gale2_32.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_32.text: That, my friend, must remain a secret. For now. Or rather: for as long as you've eyes only for someone else among our troupe.

CRD_Gale2_44.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale2_44.text: And yet you question them nonetheless.

CRD_Gale2_52.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_52.text: Caught on to that, did you? Might be the wine talking.

CRD_Gale2_8.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_8.text: The point is - I have hope. Each new sunrise may yet be the one to coax our budding bond to blossom. But I think it's fair to say -  it won't be today's.

CRD_Gale2_31.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_31.text: Now please, go and enjoy your evening. this won't be the first party I've spent moping in self-indulgence with a bottle of wine for company.

CRD_Gale2_45.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale2_45.text: Do I detect a hint of jealousy?

CRD_Gale2_7.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_7.text: Jealousy is in the eye of the beholder. Or something along those lines, the wine might be befuddling me a smidge.

CRD_Gale2_13.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale2_13.text: Didn't peg you for a sore loser, Gale.

CRD_Gale2_46.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_46.text: Am I? Perhaps I am. Or perhaps I need another glass of wine.

CRD_Gale2_21.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale2_21.text: Actually, I may just want to spend the night with you instead of Astarion.

CRD_Gale2_37.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale2_37.text: Actually, I may just want to spend the night with you instead of Karlach.

CRD_Gale2_17.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale2_17.text: Actually, I may just want to spend the night with you instead of Lae'zel.

CRD_Gale2_0.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale2_0.text: Actually, I may just want to spend the night with you instead of Minsc.

CRD_Gale2_59.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_59.text: You're all too quick to abandon the one you promised yourself to. That is not a quality I admire.

CRD_Gale2_61.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_61.text: I'm glad you feel the same way. But, while I'm eager to enjoy your company on an exclusive basis later this evening, it would be selfish to keep you to myself before then.

CRD_Gale2_38.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_38.text: So please - go, and enjoy the festivities. Anticipation will only make our reunion the sweeter.

CRD_Gale2_58.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale2_58.text: Actually, I may just want to spend the night with you instead of Shadowheart.

CRD_Gale2_57.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale2_57.text: Actually, I may just want to spend the night with you instead of Wyll.

CRD_Gale2_49.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_49.text: There's something... unspeakable about Shadowheart. But I mean that in a good way. She seems to me like a bud on the cusp of bursting into a rose.

CRD_Gale2_28.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_28.text: Wyll's a good man. He may actually be a tried-and-true storybook hero.

CRD_Gale2_47.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_47.text: Then again he's so full of himself it's a small miracle he hasn't resorted to self-cannibalism yet.

CRD_Gale2_10.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_10.text: I'm glad you sought me out. Amid all this merriment I wasn't sure we'd have a chance to speak this evening.

CRD_Gale2_26.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale2_26.text: Come now! This is a night for celebration, not suspicion.

CRD_Gale3_12.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_12.text: A beautiful night, don't you think? Nothing like a brush with destruction to make one appreciate the majesty of the celestial canvas.
CRD_Gale3_12.context: NodeContext: Wistful, missing an old friend

CRD_Gale3_0.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_0.text: It's a view I would once have shared with my companion. Though definitely unaccompanied by such revelry.
CRD_Gale3_0.context: NodeContext: Wistful, missing an old friend

CRD_Gale3_75.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_75.text: She preferred it when we were alone, curled up before a crackling hearth with some ancient, esoteric tome between us, ink glinting in the firelight...
CRD_Gale3_75.context: NodeContext: Recalling a rich, warming memory

CRD_Gale3_122.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_122.text: Not everyone is comfortable being alone with their thoughts. Though I never felt alone with a book in my hand. Or with her for company.
CRD_Gale3_122.context: NodeContext: Being generous towards the player's lack of interest, then returning to his reflective mood

CRD_Gale3_57.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_57.text: I hope you aren't talking about Mystra again...

CRD_Gale3_21.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_21.text: Who are you referring to? A former lover, perhaps?

CRD_Gale3_61.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_61.text: I speak of Tara, my tressym, assistant, my constant companion through all the ills and tribulations my hubris has thrust upon me.

CRD_Gale3_127.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_127.text: She'd be most impressed by our efforts saving these tieflings. Proud, even. And I've given her little to be proud of recently.

CRD_Gale3_110.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_110.text: After I was afflicted with my condition, I locked myself in my tower for an entire year. I was inconsolable, wallowing in my self-inflicted tragedy.

CRD_Gale3_42.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_42.text: I'd given up on myself, but Tara never did. It was her encouragement, her research that led me to my treatment. Once we knew that magically-infused items were the key, she went out to find them for me. She saved my life.

CRD_Gale3_29.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_29.text: After so long being cared for by someone else, it feels good to have repaid the favour. Not directly to Tara, but to these poor tieflings. I'm sure she would approve.

CRD_Gale3_107.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_107.text: She must be very smart, to have done all that.

CRD_Gale3_28.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_28.text: 'Smart' does her a disservice. She's a fine wizard in her own right, though somewhat held back by her lack of opposable thumbs.

CRD_Gale3_59.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_59.text: You remind me of her somewhat. The same sharp tongue. And sharp teeth.
CRD_Gale3_59.context: NodeContext: Not too heavy on the 'sharp teeth' - I'm not sure it's guaranteed that Gale knows Astarion is a vampire.

CRD_Gale3_117.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_117.text: You remind me of her somewhat. You share her pragmatic streak.

CRD_Gale3_126.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_126.text: You remind me of her somewhat. You share a certain nobility of spirit.

CRD_Gale3_116.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_116.text: You remind me of her somewhat. You share her fierceness, and her passion.

CRD_Gale3_63.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_63.text: You remind me of her somewhat. Something in the way you roll your eyes when I speak...

CRD_Gale3_4.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_4.text: You remind me of her somewhat. An expression you both share - when she gives in to her more feline qualities, a mouse trapped beneath her paw...

CRD_Gale3_50.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_50.text: I wish she were here for me to make a formal introduction, but I would never ask her to undertake such a journey. She is safer at home.

CRD_Gale3_56.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_56.text: Besides, she was always telling me I needed to spread my wings, so to speak. Find mortal friends, instead of hanging onto Mystra's coattails. So that's what I'm doing. I hope.

CRD_Gale3_67.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_67.text: Bad luck on that front - I'm actually a nymph in disguise...

CRD_Gale3_125.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_125.text: Very funny. But as we all know, nymphs are sticklers when it comes to their bathing routines. You, my friend, haven't been near a fresh spring in a tenday or more.

CRD_Gale3_9.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_9.text: Not that I don't appreciate your musk. I actually rather like it...
CRD_Gale3_9.context: NodeContext: Getting carried away, accidentally revealed he's kind of interested in the player romantically

CRD_Gale3_118.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_118.text: Well, this seems as good a time as any for me to stop babbling on.

CRD_Gale3_112.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_112.text: So I remind you of your pet? How romantic...

CRD_Gale3_22.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_22.text: I assure you, were you to meet Tara you would see the comparison for the flattery it is. But perhaps that's not a point worth labouring further.

CRD_Gale3_17.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_17.text: Suffice it to say, I think rather a lot of you. And there aren't many on this plane who I'd give such high praise.

CRD_Gale3_32.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_32.text: Don't stop there. What else do you like about me?

CRD_Gale3_25.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_25.text: I'm flattered. Is your good opinion so hard to come by?

CRD_Gale3_58.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_58.text: One doesn't become the most powerful archmage in Waterdeep and lover to the goddess of magic herself by having low standards.

CRD_Gale3_51.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_51.text: I assure you, when I tell someone they're wonderful - I mean it. And you are wonderful.
CRD_Gale3_51.context: NodeContext: sincere, giving way the depth of his growing feelings fro the player

CRD_Gale3_76.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_76.text: Being mentioned in the same breath as your pet isn't the compliment you think it is...

CRD_Gale3_68.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_68.text: Then let me say it more plainly -

CRD_Gale3_74.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_74.text: I think you're rather wonderful. And that's not a word I waste on anyone unworthy of it.

CRD_Gale3_3.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_3.text: Don't stop now. What else do you like about me?

CRD_Gale3_123.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_123.text: Were I to recite that list, I fear we'd still be here at dusk tomorrow. Many things, I assure you, but a conversation better saved for another time.
CRD_Gale3_123.context: NodeContext: Cheerfully deflecting your question, though it's clear he would have more to say

CRD_Gale3_19.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_19.text: Actually, I was thinking we'd be wonderful together...

CRD_Gale3_100.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_100.text: The feeling's mutual - you're a wonderful friend. Though usually more... erudite.

CRD_Gale3_47.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_47.text: Wine is to wit as meat is to... to... oh, I can't bloody remember it. There I go, then, proving your point.
CRD_Gale3_47.context: NodeContext: Trying to sound impressive, a bit flustered

CRD_Gale3_115.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_115.text: Perhaps we'd better leave it at that. My ineloquent tongue isn't worthy of your ear at present.
CRD_Gale3_115.context: NodeContext: Cheerfully accepting the brush off, not taking it personally

CRD_Gale3_113.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_113.text: With my condition as volatile as it is, I fear any undue, er, excitement, may tip it over the edge. So to speak.

CRD_Gale3_53.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_53.text: Go - enjoy your evening. Nothing better for the heart than a good night's rest, and mine is gladdened to know I'll have the pleasure of your company again come morning.

CRD_Gale3_43.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_43.text: Go, indulge in the frivolities - they're good for the heart. And mine will be all the lighter, to see you enjoying yourself.

CRD_Gale3_80.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_80.text: I can't say I share the same high opinion of you, Gale.

CRD_Gale3_99.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_99.text: Always bringing such candour to our conversations. Some would think twice about mocking Gale of Waterdeep, but you just go straight for the gut.
CRD_Gale3_99.context: NodeContext: Playing along, making fun of himself

CRD_Gale3_108.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_108.text: I like that about you. It's one of your rarer qualities, though I fear my ego can take no more of it tonight.
CRD_Gale3_108.context: NodeContext: Cheerfully accepting the brush off, not taking it personally

CRD_Gale3_89.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_89.text: If this is an attempt at flirting, you should stop. I'm not interested.

CRD_Gale3_14.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_14.text: Right. Understood. You shall hear no more on the subject from me.

CRD_Gale3_91.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_91.text: Consider this budding romance thoroughly nipped. Though I hope our friendship need not come to such an abrupt end.

CRD_Gale3_97.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_97.text: I'm not interested in you, Gale. Not in that way.

CRD_Gale3_48.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_48.text: What if she doesn't like me?

CRD_Gale3_45.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_45.text: She sounds like a fine animal. One I'd be honoured to know.

CRD_Gale3_37.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_37.text: She'll love you. So long as you don't rub her belly. She hates it when anyone does that.

CRD_Gale3_64.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_64.text: Do you like having your belly rubbed?

CRD_Gale3_33.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_33.text: The pleasures I experienced in Mystra's embrace go far beyond the thrill of having one's tummy tickled. I remember once, she took the smallest piece of the Weave and made it into -
CRD_Gale3_33.context: NodeContext: Taking the question seriously, missing the flirtatious side of it

CRD_Gale3_105.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_105.context: NodeContext: Realising that the player was flirting, getting flustered

CRD_Gale3_41.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_41.text: I see. Then perhaps we see each other in the same light after all. A resplendent one, flush with warmth and anticipation, but one which I must shy away from, for now.
CRD_Gale3_41.context: NodeContext: Still flustered, but pleased to learn you like him romantically. Then getting to the point - he can't do anything until the orb is dealt with

CRD_Gale3_72.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_72.text: You know what, I think I've clearly had far too much wine. And you've had nowhere near enough. I think this is a conversation best held back on - for now.
CRD_Gale3_72.context: NodeContext: Flustered, hesitating to explicitly say what he thinks you were offering, then backtracking altogether

CRD_Gale3_90.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_90.text: She sounds great. But I was hoping I meant more to you than an animal companion...

CRD_Gale3_114.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_114.text: Not as much as I hate talking about cats. Is there nothing else on your mind?

CRD_Gale3_88.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_88.text: Not an animal lover? Nobody's perfect, I suppose.
CRD_Gale3_88.context: NodeContext: Sincere - he's offering something that has meaning, a sign of how much he likes you

CRD_Gale3_13.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_13.text: Nonetheless, your finer qualities are remarkably plentiful.

CRD_Gale3_65.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_65.text: Sadly not. If I'm being entirely honest, my social circle is rather small. More of a dot. Or a pinhead.

CRD_Gale3_27.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_27.text: I've got aquaintances, certainly. Plenty of colleagues. But friends? Those are precious indeed.

CRD_Gale3_131.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_131.text: I hope, though we've only known each other for a short time, I might be able to count you among that number?

CRD_Gale3_96.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_96.text: Of course. I hoped we might be more than friends...

CRD_Gale3_92.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_92.text: That depends. What do you like about me?

CRD_Gale3_18.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_18.text: Friends with the mighty Gale of Waterdeep? I'd be honoured.

CRD_Gale3_49.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_49.text: I wouldn't call this a friendship. More a series of necessary interactions.

CRD_Gale3_26.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_26.text: Please - feel free to enjoy yourself elsewhere. No doubt there are others here who offer more welcome company.

CRD_Gale3_54.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_54.text: You remind me of her somewhat. There's a steeliness to you, an unwavering tenacity even in the face of, to be frank, quite dire odds.

CRD_Gale3_66.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_66.text: You must have been lonely, with only Tara for company...

CRD_Gale3_78.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_78.text: Sometimes. But I imposed it upon myself, after all. I set up enough wards to keep an army at bay, never mind the few colleagues who sought to inquire about my welfare.

CRD_Gale3_79.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_79.text: Tara did her best to keep my spirits up, of course, but there's only so much one tressym can make up for one's entire social circle. And she was often gone seeking items to treat my condition.

CRD_Gale3_62.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_62.text: You're the first person I've spent any significant time with in a year or more. Spending time in your company, I realise that I may have left behind the greater part of my wit, and sensitivity, in my tower.

CRD_Gale3_40.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_40.text: I'm glad. To know you enjoy my company is, well, it's rather wonderful actually. I'd be loathe to waste the time of someone who's become rather important to me.

CRD_Gale3_104.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_104.text: No one came to visit you during your confinement?

CRD_Gale3_95.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_95.text: I rather like the Gale stood in front of me. In fact, I'd like to see more of him...

CRD_Gale3_82.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_82.text: She'd be proud to see me keeping such fine company - the saviour of those poor tieflings, no less. And I've given her precious little to be proud of recently.

CRD_Gale3_77.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_77.text: She has a good heart, and she would recognise the same in your actions here. I'm sure she'd approve of me lending myself to your efforts.

CRD_Gale3_102.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale3_102.text: Are you... are you talking about your cat?

CRD_Gale3_129.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_129.context: NodeContext: Shocked at the player's suggestion. Note: this is a statue in Waterdeep's religious burial district

CRD_Gale3_55.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_55.text: Tara is not any cat. She's a tressym. And given your confusion, I'm guessing you've never met one. They're brilliant creatures - fine company for any self-respecting wizard.

CRD_Gale3_16.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_16.text: Don't worry about me - I'm quite content to enjoy the party from here. Go, enjoy yourself.

CRD_Gale3_46.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_46.text: Even in such fraught times as these, there is peace to be found in the stillness as evening draws in.
CRD_Gale3_46.context: NodeContext: Wistful, missing an old friend

CRD_Gale3_15.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_15.text: I used to while away many hours just like these with my companion, though in far comfier surrounds.
CRD_Gale3_15.context: NodeContext: Wistful, missing an old friend

CRD_Gale3_94.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale3_94.text: Don't let me drag you away. Enjoy yourself - you earned a night of revelry.

CRD_Laezel_41.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_41.text: Soon. When you rest, I will come.

CRD_Laezel_45.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_45.text: Celebrate now. Come dawn, we depart.

CRD_Laezel_57.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_57.text: Celebrate now. Come dawn, we depart.

CRD_Laezel_59.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_59.text: To think you might have known paradise.

CRD_Laezel_44.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_44.text: Celebrate now. Come dawn, we depart.

CRD_Laezel_5.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_5.text: Yes. I want your body, and I want it tonight.

CRD_Laezel_63.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_63.text: I have seen the kith'raki tear a screaming neogi's legs from its belly to fashion into blades.

CRD_Laezel_97.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_97.text: Yet they could not match your nerve today. It was enough to drive me to madness.
CRD_Laezel_97.context: NodeContext: She takes a shuddering breath at the end.

CRD_Laezel_19.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_19.text: I smell their blood on you still. I smell your moisture.

CRD_Laezel_55.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_55.text: A glorious reward for a glorious battle.

CRD_Laezel_78.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_78.text: Go on, have your fun. And do not wipe away a single bead of sweat. It's intoxicating.

CRD_Laezel_103.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_103.text: How torturous for us both that I'll never get a taste.

CRD_Laezel_7.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_7.text: I smell their blood on you still. I'd have liked to have tasted it.

CRD_Laezel_23.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_23.text: Too bad for us both your bunk will be quite busy. Take all the pleasures you can, before dawn brings their end.

CRD_Laezel_77.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_77.text: I smell their blood on you still. I smell your sweat.

CRD_Laezel_106.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_106.text: You know the fortune of my company.
CRD_Laezel_106.context: NodeContext: Said with a bit of a sigh, but not too meanly. She does not like rejection but this is still a more intimate scene

CRD_Laezel_12.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_12.text: Another fortune yet stands before you. A warrior's flesh, rarely tasted.

CRD_Laezel_54.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_54.text: Bah - think if you must. The chance will pass come light of day.

CRD_Laezel_8.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_8.text: Yes. I will share my bed with you tonight.

CRD_Laezel_0.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_0.text: Given our history, I can't believe you're asking. And I can't believe I'm saying 'yes'...

CRD_Laezel_26.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_26.context: NodeContext: Said with a sexy, steely confidence.

CRD_Laezel_90.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_90.text: When you lie down for the night, I will come.

CRD_Laezel_39.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_39.text: And I will take what is mine.

CRD_Laezel_24.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_24.text: I'd love to share my bed with you tonight.

CRD_Laezel_74.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_74.text: I'd love nothing more, but I'm afraid I can't touch anyone until my engine is fixed.

CRD_Laezel_76.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_76.text: A loathsome hurdle. Watching you burn lit a fire in me I could not quench alone.

CRD_Laezel_93.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_93.text: I will have to seek relief elsewhere.

CRD_Laezel_17.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_17.text: A night such as this calls for flesh to feast on. And I have chosen the sweetest.

CRD_Laezel_68.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_68.text: Sorry, but I'm not interested in you like that.

CRD_Laezel_6.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_6.text: There are, after all, other spreads before me. Wyll looks particularly tempting tonight.

CRD_Laezel_1.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_1.text: I will not go long without pleasure.

CRD_Laezel_73.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_73.text: There are, after all, other spreads before me. Gale looks particularly tempting tonight.

CRD_Laezel_32.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_32.text: There are, after all, other spreads before me. Astarion looks particularly tempting tonight.

CRD_Laezel_92.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_92.text: There are, after all, other spreads before me.

CRD_Laezel_10.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_10.text: A pity for us you have promised your body to Astarion.

CRD_Laezel_18.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_18.text: I hope for your sake he doesn't come too near your neck.

CRD_Laezel_91.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_91.text: Perhaps we could get to know each other another time.

CRD_Laezel_11.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_11.text: I will take pleasure when I wish, and from whom I wish. Wyll looks particularly tempting tonight.

CRD_Laezel_86.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_86.text: One day, fortune may favour you.

CRD_Laezel_29.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_29.text: I will take pleasure when I wish, and from whom I wish. Gale looks particularly tempting tonight.

CRD_Laezel_100.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_100.text: I will take pleasure when I wish, and from whom I wish. Astarion looks particularly tempting tonight.

CRD_Laezel_65.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_65.text: I will take pleasure when I wish, and from whom I wish.

CRD_Laezel_64.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_64.text: You might still persuade me to share the night with you instead.

CRD_Laezel_49.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_49.text: I will do no such thing - not when you have turned your back on me so often.

CRD_Laezel_52.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_52.text: I don't appreciate the snide tone. I'm happy with my choice.

CRD_Laezel_40.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_40.text: But come morning, you will wonder.

CRD_Laezel_99.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_99.text: You will wonder how my lips might have tasted, how my fingers on your skin might have felt.

CRD_Laezel_47.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_47.text: Oh, but do enjoy yourself this night. I intend to, myself. Wyll looks particularly tempting.

CRD_Laezel_22.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_22.text: Oh, but do enjoy yourself this night. I intend to, myself. Gale looks particularly tempting.

CRD_Laezel_62.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_62.text: Oh, but do enjoy yourself this night. I intend to, myself. Astarion looks particularly tempting.

CRD_Laezel_95.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_95.text: Oh, but do enjoy yourself this night. I intend to, myself.

CRD_Laezel_34.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_34.text: I'm grateful for your aid. You really are a gifted warrior.

CRD_Laezel_13.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_13.text: Vlaakith demands of me no less.

CRD_Laezel_85.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_85.text: Mm - if only I might lay claim to my proper trophy.

CRD_Laezel_9.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_9.text: A pity for us you have promised your body to Gale.

CRD_Laezel_14.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_14.text: I've no doubt he's as seductive as he is succinct.

CRD_Laezel_53.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_53.text: A pity for us you have promised your body to the tiefling.

CRD_Laezel_58.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_58.text: I've no doubt she will satisfy your tastes for the mundane.

CRD_Laezel_33.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_33.text: A pity for us you have promised your night to the half-elf.

CRD_Laezel_15.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_15.text: I've no doubt she will satisfy your tastes for endless conversation.

CRD_Laezel_36.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_36.text: A pity for us you have promised your night to Gale.

CRD_Laezel_42.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_42.text: I've no doubt he will satisfy your tastes for endless conversation.

CRD_Laezel_101.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_101.text: A pity for us you have promised your body to the Blade.

CRD_Laezel_16.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_16.text: I've no doubt he will satisfy your tastes for the mundane.

CRD_Laezel_27.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_27.text: A pity for us both you have promised yourself to another.

CRD_Laezel_82.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_82.text: A pity for us both you've turned your back on me so often.

CRD_Laezel_84.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_84.text: Be as snide as you want. I'm not interested in you like that.

CRD_Laezel_94.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_94.text: I am grateful for your aid. You are a gifted warrior.

CRD_Laezel_71.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_71.text: Vlaakith demands of me no less.

CRD_Laezel_88.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_88.text: If only you'd earned the right to lay at my side.

CRD_Shadowheart_21.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_21.text: I already got my answer. Let's not make this awkward.

CRD_Shadowheart_26.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_26.text: Enjoy the rest of your night. But maybe do it elsewhere.

CRD_Shadowheart_27.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_27.text: Don't forget our little agreement. As soon as things quiet down here...

CRD_Shadowheart_50.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_50.text: We should've had wine more often. More warming than the fire.

CRD_Shadowheart_64.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_64.text: Best hope all this wine makes me forget what you tried to do.

CRD_Shadowheart_113.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_113.text: Everyone seems to be in high spirits.
CRD_Shadowheart_113.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart and the player standing throughout, chatting in a party setting. Shadowheart has a glass of wine in hand,NodeContext: Shadowheart and the player standing throughout this dialogue, chatting in a party setting. Shadowheart has a glass of wine in hand,

CRD_Shadowheart_52.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_52.text: Strange... you know who I never thought I'd find myself caring for?

CRD_Shadowheart_70.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_70.text: Exactly right. Never gave them much thought. Certainly not that bunch in the grove.

CRD_Shadowheart_33.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_33.text: Your words, not mine. But not what I mean.

CRD_Shadowheart_13.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_13.text: I wouldn't quite say that... but no, that's not what I mean.

CRD_Shadowheart_121.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_121.text: I mean desperate people... like those refugees. Never gave them much thought. Certainly not that bunch in the grove.

CRD_Shadowheart_60.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_60.text: Yet we came through for them. We saved their lives. Odd.

CRD_Shadowheart_89.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_89.text: Not so odd. We did the right thing.

CRD_Shadowheart_80.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_80.text: That's more easily said by some than others.

CRD_Shadowheart_103.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_103.text: Are you worried Shar won't approve?

CRD_Shadowheart_9.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_9.text: Something like that. I was taught to reject anything that distracted from Shar...
CRD_Shadowheart_9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart looks the player up and down.

CRD_Shadowheart_34.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_34.text: ...but there'll be time for penance later.

CRD_Shadowheart_4.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_4.text: Don't get used to it. We just needed to clear the path forward.

CRD_Shadowheart_41.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_41.text: How pragmatic. One would think letting the goblins torch the grove would have resulted in the same.

CRD_Shadowheart_2.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_2.text: But nobody's here to debate right from wrong.

CRD_Shadowheart_69.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_69.context: NodeContext: She's trying to make this sound nonchalant, but isn't quite succeeding

CRD_Shadowheart_1.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_1.text: I won't keep you long - I gather you've already made plans with someone for your evening.
CRD_Shadowheart_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Places her glass down to top it up, reaching for a nearby wine bottle.NodeContext: The player's already spoken for and SH will respect that. Places her glass down to top it up, reaching for a nearby wine bottle.

CRD_Shadowheart_6.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_6.text: Maybe those plans could change, for the right person...

CRD_Shadowheart_82.speaker: Narrator
CRD_Shadowheart_82.text: *Shadowheart says nothing, but the glimmer of interest in her eyes is unmistakable.*
CRD_Shadowheart_82.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart gives a bold 'I'm up for it if you are' look.

CRD_Shadowheart_5.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_5.text: I'll find you later, once the camp's asleep.

CRD_Shadowheart_54.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_54.text: I don't suppose you'd consider some sort of shared arrangement?

CRD_Shadowheart_66.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_66.text: On second thought, perhaps not. I should honour my other arrangement.

CRD_Shadowheart_35.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_35.text: I've arranged some... company, yes. It could be a long evening.

CRD_Shadowheart_11.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_11.text: There - some liquid courage. And try to get some rest too if you can; tomorrow's another day.
CRD_Shadowheart_11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart pours a second glass of wine for the player and hands it over.NodeContext: A little playful and suggestive. She knows the player's got a liaison with someone else planned for later in the night

CRD_Shadowheart_114.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_114.text: We should wait a little while. Until the others have drifted off.

CRD_Shadowheart_90.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_90.text: I'll find you after everyone's turned in for the night.

CRD_Shadowheart_30.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_30.text: Best not keep me waiting. I'd prefer not to entertain myself...
CRD_Shadowheart_30.context: NodeContext: Just a hint of playfulness. Fully aware of the innuendo but largely playing it straight and letting the player's mind do the rest.

CRD_Shadowheart_99.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_99.text: Not keen on sharing with the others?

CRD_Shadowheart_100.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_100.text: As you like. Try not to tire yourself out too much.

CRD_Shadowheart_39.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_39.text: Just a bottle. I think you have other plans afterwards - wouldn't want to keep you.
CRD_Shadowheart_39.context: NodeContext: The player's already spoken for and SH will respect that.

CRD_Shadowheart_49.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_49.text: ...Well, maybe I would. But first come, first served.
CRD_Shadowheart_49.context: NodeContext: A little suggestive. Make the player feel like they've missed out.

CRD_Shadowheart_32.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_32.text: It's quite a bottle. I liberated one of the finer vintages earlier.

CRD_Shadowheart_16.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_16.text: Best enjoyed someplace private, I think.

CRD_Shadowheart_56.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_56.text: I thought you might've wanted to mingle with the others.
CRD_Shadowheart_56.context: NodeContext: A little surpised. She thought the player would have had enough of her company by now.

CRD_Shadowheart_59.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_59.text: Are you trying to get rid of me?

CRD_Shadowheart_106.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_106.text: No, but I thought you might be keen to get away from me. We haven't always seen eye to eye, after all.

CRD_Shadowheart_67.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_67.text: There'll be time for that later.

CRD_Shadowheart_8.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_8.text: True. But I thought you might not want to linger with me. We haven't always seen eye to eye, after all.

CRD_Shadowheart_63.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_63.text: Besides, I'm sure there's plenty of people who'll be keen to celebrate most thoroughly with you.
CRD_Shadowheart_63.context: NodeContext: A little cheeky and knowing. She knows the player will likely be very popular at the party.

CRD_Shadowheart_71.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_71.text: I mean you saved the grove. I'm sure you'll find you're quite popular, if you look around.

CRD_Shadowheart_58.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_58.text: You sure about that? Maybe they dislike me as much as you do.

CRD_Shadowheart_12.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_12.text: You're putting words in my mouth - I never said I disliked you. It's just we have some work to do, to get on each other's good sides.

CRD_Shadowheart_81.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_81.text: And yes, I'm sure there's someone out there for you. Gale's been stealing a glance or three in your direction...
CRD_Shadowheart_81.context: NodeContext: Knowing. Giving the player a hint that one of the other party members might be interested

CRD_Shadowheart_104.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_104.text: And yes, I'm sure there's someone out there for you. You should have seen the look Wyll was giving you earlier...
CRD_Shadowheart_104.context: NodeContext: Knowing. Giving the player a hint that one of the other party members might be interested

CRD_Shadowheart_127.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_127.text: And yes, I'm sure there's someone out there for you. I saw the way Astarion's been stealing glances at you. Hungry in more ways than usual, maybe.
CRD_Shadowheart_127.context: NodeContext: Knowing. Giving the player a hint that one of the other party members might be interested

CRD_Shadowheart_86.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_86.text: And yes, I'm sure there's someone out there for you. Lae'zel for example - I saw her looking at you a little less murderously than usual.
CRD_Shadowheart_86.context: NodeContext: Knowing. Giving the player a hint that one of the other party members might be interested

CRD_Shadowheart_14.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_14.text: And yes, I'm sure there's someone out there for you. You should go see who'd like to spend the night with the saviour of the grove...

CRD_Shadowheart_20.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_20.text: Maybe I'd like to celebrate with you...

CRD_Shadowheart_19.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_19.text: Maybe you would. But I'm not cruel enough to get your hopes up. In spite of what some might believe...

CRD_Shadowheart_96.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_96.text: I think I could win you over, if I wanted.

CRD_Shadowheart_24.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_24.text: Oh you do, do you? I'm not some dewy-eyed tiefling maiden you just saved - you'll need to do a lot more leg-work before I commit to any hip-work.

CRD_Shadowheart_105.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_105.text: I see. So that no is final...?

CRD_Shadowheart_108.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_108.text: For now. Don't worry, there'll be plenty of fun for you tonight. Just not in my tent.

CRD_Shadowheart_120.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_120.text: I understand. Before I go... how can we see eye to eye?

CRD_Shadowheart_111.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_111.text: What, some advice on how to make me more bearable? All right, if you like...

CRD_Shadowheart_92.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_92.text: Respect my mission, my beliefs, keep us focused on finding a cure...

CRD_Shadowheart_23.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_23.text: I'm not half as mysterious as you might think. Respect my privacy, my beliefs, keep us focused on finding a cure...

CRD_Shadowheart_10.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_10.text: If you do that, well... I see no reason why we shouldn't get closer.

CRD_Shadowheart_0.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_0.text: But enough about me. I saw Wyll looking at you. I bet he'd like a word, or more...
CRD_Shadowheart_0.context: NodeContext: Knowing. Giving the player a hint that one of the other party members might be interested

CRD_Shadowheart_91.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_91.text: Now enough about me. Haven't you seen the way Gale's been stealing looks at you? Go on, see if he wants something, or someone...
CRD_Shadowheart_91.context: NodeContext: Knowing. Giving the player a hint that one of the other party members might be interested

CRD_Shadowheart_72.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_72.text: Now enough about me. Did you see the way Astarion's been looking at you? Hungry in more ways than usual, maybe. Go on, you know what to do...
CRD_Shadowheart_72.context: NodeContext: Knowing. Giving the player a hint that one of the other party members might be interested

CRD_Shadowheart_77.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_77.text: Enough about me. I saw Lae'zel looking at you a little less murderously than usual. Go on, you know what to do...
CRD_Shadowheart_77.context: NodeContext: Knowing. Giving the player a hint that one of the other party members might be interested

CRD_Shadowheart_118.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_118.text: Now enough about me. You should go see who'd like to spend the night with the saviour of the grove...

CRD_Shadowheart_88.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_88.text: I'm not half as mysterious as you might think. Respect my privacy, my opinion, keep us focused on finding a cure...

CRD_Shadowheart_37.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_37.text: In that case, I'll leave you to enjoy your evening.

CRD_Shadowheart_95.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_95.text: Have fun... and don't be a stranger.
CRD_Shadowheart_95.context: NodeContext: Sincere on 'don't be a stranger', Door's open for future relationship development.

CRD_Shadowheart_76.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_76.text: You're not that bad, no. You might pretend to be that bad from time to time...

CRD_Shadowheart_115.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_115.text: Why I've no idea of what you mean...

CRD_Shadowheart_116.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_116.text: You sure about that? There's a cruel streak in you, I think.

CRD_Shadowheart_83.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_83.text: Keep prodding, and maybe you'll find out for certain.

CRD_Shadowheart_48.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_48.text: Now, on you go. And happy hunting.

CRD_Shadowheart_129.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_129.text: Now that you mention it... thanks for the tip. Enjoy your evening.

CRD_Shadowheart_31.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_31.text: I will, but not as much as you'll enjoy yours, I'm betting...

CRD_Shadowheart_102.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_102.text: You're all the company I need right now.

CRD_Shadowheart_84.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_84.text: That so? I won't pretend I'm not surprised... we haven't always seen eye to eye, after all.

CRD_Shadowheart_73.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_73.text: I suppose I should. Enjoy your evening.

CRD_Shadowheart_110.speaker: Narrator
CRD_Shadowheart_110.text: *Shadowheart trails off and glances around at the party. She turns back to you, mildly surprised you're still there.*

CRD_Shadowheart_85.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_85.text: I'd rather enjoy this wine on my own, so... find your entertainment elsewhere?

CRD_Shadowheart_74.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_74.text: Sounds like the wine is talking.

CRD_Shadowheart_123.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_123.text: It's not talking enough for my liking.
CRD_Shadowheart_123.context: CinematicNodeContext: Holding up her glass and considering its contents in a playful critique.NodeContext: 'Wish I had something stronger'. Holding up her glass and considering its contents in a playful critique.

CRD_Shadowheart_65.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_65.text: I think you'll find I've been showing ample concern for myself since the moment we met.

CRD_Shadowheart_53.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_53.text: Desperate people... refugees. Never gave them much thought. Certainly not that bunch in the grove.

CRD_Shadowheart_51.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_51.text: I saw you with Astarion. You two looked... cosy.

CRD_Shadowheart_75.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_75.text: I saw you with Gale. You two looked... cosy.

CRD_Shadowheart_68.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_68.text: I saw you with Karlach. You two looked... cosy.

CRD_Shadowheart_112.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_112.text: I saw you with Lae'zel. You two looked... cosy.

CRD_Shadowheart_18.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_18.text: I saw you with Wyll. You two looked... cosy.

CRD_Shadowheart_17.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_17.text: Far be it from me to judge. Blood must still be running a little hot after everything.

CRD_Astarion_2.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_2.text: You know, I never pictured myself as a hero.
CRD_Astarion_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Holding a bottle of wineNodeContext: Looking around, holding a bottle of wine

CRD_Astarion_25.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_25.text: Never thought I'd be the one they toast for saving so many lives. And now that I'm here...
CRD_Astarion_25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Holding a bottle of wineNodeContext: Reflecting. Holding a bottle of wine

CRD_Astarion_130.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_130.text: I hate it. This is awful.
CRD_Astarion_130.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion drinks wine from the bottle, speaks his line, then sets the bottle down on a table.NodeContext: Swigs from the wine, but it tastes foul. He pulls a face in reaction to the wine, but 'I hate it. This is awful' is referring to the party generally. He sets the bottle down on a table beside him.

CRD_Astarion_75.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_75.text: We killed some goblins to save some tieflings. The tally of lives didn't change much.

CRD_Astarion_15.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_15.text: But what do I get for all my hard work? A pat on the head and vinegar for wine.

CRD_Astarion_105.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_105.text: Whinge all you want - I'm having fun.

CRD_Astarion_80.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_80.text: By all means, go and enjoy yourself.

CRD_Astarion_108.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_108.text: I'll be here, waiting for the sunrise.

CRD_Astarion_27.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_27.text: True, the goblins would have thrown a wilder party.

CRD_Astarion_68.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_68.text: I'm just looking for a little more excitement. A little more fun.

CRD_Astarion_16.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_16.text: And what's your idea of 'a little fun'?

CRD_Astarion_57.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_57.text: By the hells. Sex. Passion. Fun.
CRD_Astarion_57.context: NodeContext: Can't believe how nieve you are

CRD_Astarion_20.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_20.text: It's easy for some. I see Lae'zel's marked you as her territory.

CRD_Astarion_12.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_12.text: I just hope she leaves you in one piece. We can't take a tenday for you to recover from whatever her idea of 'fun' is.

CRD_Astarion_0.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_0.text: I'm looking forward to it. It'll be fun.

CRD_Astarion_118.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_118.text: Ha! No, my love, I'm not jealous of the beating our gith friend will give you.

CRD_Astarion_81.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_81.text: Ha! No, my love, you and Shadowheart can get up to whatever you want. It means nothing to me.

CRD_Astarion_76.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_76.text: Ha! No, my love, I'm not jealous of the walking encyclopaedia.

CRD_Astarion_4.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_4.text: Ha! No, my love, I'm not jealous of the tiefling.

CRD_Astarion_112.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_112.text: But you go ahead. Have fun.
CRD_Astarion_112.context: NodeContext: a hint of bitterness, but only a hint

CRD_Astarion_115.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_115.text: Ha! No. If he had an incubus instead of that cambion? That might be a different story.
CRD_Astarion_115.context: NodeContext: incubus = sexy male devil. Cambion = trickster devil (in this case female)

CRD_Astarion_102.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_102.text: Ha! No, I've seen enough blades in my time.

CRD_Astarion_142.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_142.text: Are you offering something better? Because I could be persuaded...

CRD_Astarion_37.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_37.text: It's easy for some. You and Shadowheart seem to have a connection. It looks very sweet.

CRD_Astarion_111.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_111.text: Not what I'd call 'passionate', or 'interesting', but sweet.

CRD_Astarion_122.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_122.text: It's easy for some, of course. You and Gale seem to be getting on very well.

CRD_Astarion_141.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_141.text: I wonder if he uses magic in the bedroom? That could go very well or very badly.

CRD_Astarion_78.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_78.text: It's easy for some, of course. You and Wyll seem to be getting on very well.

CRD_Astarion_104.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_104.text: Are you looking forward to seeing his 'Blade of Frontiers'? I hope it's more greatsword than dagger.

CRD_Astarion_18.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_18.text: It's easy for some, of course. You and Karlach seem to be getting on very well.

CRD_Astarion_51.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_51.text: It's none of my business, of course. I wouldn't want to intrude.

CRD_Astarion_126.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_126.text: By the hells. Sex, my dear. A night of passion.
CRD_Astarion_126.context: NodeContext: Can't believe how nieve you are

CRD_Astarion_8.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_8.text: That had better not mean 'I want to kill something'.

CRD_Astarion_107.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_107.text: Not with you, just to be clear.
CRD_Astarion_107.context: NodeContext: Worried the player will think Astarion wants to have sex with them. They're not up to his standards, though.

CRD_Astarion_14.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_14.text: I mean, can you imagine? Urgh. No.
CRD_Astarion_14.context: NodeContext: Worried the player will think Astarion wants to have sex with them. They're not up to his standards, though.

CRD_Astarion_54.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_54.text: Anyway, don't let me keep you. I'm sure you have someone else to sniff around.

CRD_Astarion_138.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_138.text: Nothing so dramatic. Just you and me and - well, maybe a little death? Figuratively speaking.
CRD_Astarion_138.context: NodeContext: 'little death' in the sense of 'orgasm'

CRD_Astarion_74.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_74.text: Not at all! I was hoping for companionship and - well, maybe a little death. Figuratively speaking.
CRD_Astarion_74.context: NodeContext: 'little death' in the sense of 'orgasm'

CRD_Astarion_48.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_48.text: We could have fun? We could spend some 'quality time' together.

CRD_Astarion_88.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_88.text: Do you think Lae'zel would approve? I saw how she looked at you earlier.
CRD_Astarion_88.context: NodeContext: teasing the player for their interest in another character

CRD_Astarion_119.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_119.text: I'd hate to get between the gith and her trophy. No, I think we'll end this evening as friends.

CRD_Astarion_93.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_93.text: Do you think Shadowheart would approve? I saw how she looked at you earlier.
CRD_Astarion_93.context: NodeContext: teasing the player for their interest in another character

CRD_Astarion_23.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_23.text: I don't know what her idea of a good time is, but it seems to involve you. I'd hate to intrude.

CRD_Astarion_5.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_5.text: True, I'd rather lie with them.

CRD_Astarion_120.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_120.text: Do you think Gale would approve? I saw how he looked at you earlier.
CRD_Astarion_120.context: NodeContext: teasing the player for their interest in another character

CRD_Astarion_114.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_114.text: Do you think Karlach would approve? I saw how she looked at you earlier.
CRD_Astarion_114.context: NodeContext: teasing the player for their interest in another character

CRD_Astarion_7.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_7.text: Do you think Wyll would approve? I saw how he looked at you earlier.
CRD_Astarion_7.context: NodeContext: teasing the player for their interest in another character

CRD_Astarion_101.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_101.text: No, I wouldn't want to get in the middle of whatever that is. We'll end tonight as friends.

CRD_Astarion_22.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_22.text: Well, that'd certainly spice up this evening.

CRD_Astarion_44.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_44.text: Let's wait until things quieten down. Once the others are asleep, we'll find each other.

CRD_Astarion_83.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_83.text: All right, let's do it. I'll see you later.

CRD_Astarion_55.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_55.text: Indeed you will, my love. Indeed you will.
CRD_Astarion_55.context: NodeContext: Response to 'I'll see you later tonight.' - player just agreed to hook up with you

CRD_Astarion_56.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_56.text: I'm not sure. Let me get back to you.

CRD_Astarion_64.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_64.text: All right, but don't take too long. You're not the only tasty morsel around here.

CRD_Astarion_72.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_72.text: Never listen to your second thoughts. They always spoil the fun.

CRD_Astarion_95.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_95.text: But fine. If you're determined to ruin your evening, I won't stop you.

CRD_Astarion_77.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_77.text: I'm flattered, but I think not. It's not you, you understand, it's me.
CRD_Astarion_77.context: NodeContext: pretending he's trying to reassure you

CRD_Astarion_132.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_132.context: NodeContext: previous line: 'it's not you. It's me.'

CRD_Astarion_131.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_131.text: We could have fun? We could spend some 'quality time' together.

CRD_Astarion_6.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_6.text: Living in constant peril isn't exciting enough for you?

CRD_Astarion_33.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_33.text: Don't be so sour. I like a good time as much as anyone.

CRD_Astarion_86.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_86.text: You know, we could always make our own entertainment, darling. Get a little closer, so to speak.

CRD_Astarion_110.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_110.text: I'd rather bed a goblin, darling.

CRD_Astarion_135.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_135.text: And here I mistook you for someone with taste. A pity.
CRD_Astarion_135.context: NodeContext: your advances have just been rejected

CRD_Astarion_35.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_35.context: NodeContext: Player said they might sleep with you if you say 'please'. You're thrown - you've never been in this position before

CRD_Astarion_67.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_67.text: You are an insolent little pup, aren't you?
CRD_Astarion_67.context: NodeContext: They just told you they'd rather fuck a goblin. You're kind of amused, kind of angry,

CRD_Astarion_117.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_117.text: But have it your way. I'm happy to entertain myself.

CRD_Astarion_129.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_129.context: NodeContext: Annoyed, you've just been humiliated. 'You insolent little brat' is the full line.

CRD_Astarion_133.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_133.text: Fine. Enjoy your night with whatever beast will have you.

CRD_Astarion_84.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_84.text: Good boy! Let's get together tonight.

CRD_Astarion_43.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_43.text: Cheeky little pup. I'll see you later.

CRD_Astarion_50.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_50.text: Will you now? Don't take too long. You're not the only tasty morsel here.

CRD_Astarion_70.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_70.text: I'm kidding. Once everyone's asleep, I'll find you and we can have some fun.

CRD_Astarion_26.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_26.text: Living in constant peril isn't exciting enough for you?

CRD_Astarion_47.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player turns and walks away.NodeContext: Said to player as they walk away.

CRD_Astarion_49.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_49.text: Take his bottle and try the wine.

CRD_Astarion_13.speaker: Narrator
CRD_Astarion_13.text: *It's a heavy, rich red - dry and sharp.*
CRD_Astarion_13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player picks up the bottle and takes a swig.

CRD_Astarion_1.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_1.context: NodeContext: referring to the wine. The player's just been told that the wine tastes delicious, but to a vampire it still tastes like muck.

CRD_Astarion_82.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_82.text: All I want is a little fun. Is that so much to ask?

CRD_Astarion_21.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_21.text: You did a good thing. Suck it up and enjoy yourself.

CRD_Astarion_123.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_123.text: Enjoy myself? There's a worm in my brain, hunters on my trail, and all I've got to drink is wine that tastes like vinegar.

CRD_Astarion_30.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_30.text: Relax, all your problems will still be there in the morning.

CRD_Astarion_134.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_134.text: That means I have to survive tonight. And this party.

CRD_Astarion_127.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_127.text: Enjoy myself? There's a worm in my brain, I'm surrounded by idiots, and all I've got to drink is wine that tastes like vinegar.

CRD_Astarion_52.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_52.text: It's not that bad. Think of all the goblins you killed.

CRD_Astarion_29.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_29.context: NodeContext: Wistful, maybe with a giggle

CRD_Astarion_46.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_46.text: Still, I would've liked more for my trouble than a pat on the head and vinegar for wine.

CRD_Astarion_10.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_10.text: I hope you're not here to beg. It's so unbecoming.

CRD_Astarion_60.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_60.text: You're eager, aren't you? But we need to wait a little longer.

CRD_Astarion_139.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_139.text: Once everyone's in their bedrolls, we'll slip out of ours and find each other.

CRD_Astarion_73.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_73.text: Do you mind? I'm very busy.

CRD_Astarion_121.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_121.text: Just so you know, I'm spending tonight with Lae'zel.

CRD_Astarion_99.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_99.text: Just so you know, I'm spending tonight with Shadowheart.

CRD_Astarion_136.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_136.text: Just so you know, I'm spending tonight with Gale.

CRD_Astarion_96.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_96.text: Just so you know, I'm spending tonight with Karlach.

CRD_Astarion_128.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_128.text: Are you now? Well, lucky her.

CRD_Astarion_42.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_42.text: Just so you know, I'm spending tonight with Wyll.

CRD_Astarion_109.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_109.text: Are you now? Well, lucky him.

CRD_Astarion_85.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_85.text: Thank you so much for telling me. Now please do piss off.

CRD_Astarion_41.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_41.text: Interested in sharing a bed tonight?

CRD_Astarion_63.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_63.text: A bed and so much more.

CRD_Astarion_144.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_144.text: Interested in sharing a bed tonight?

CRD_Astarion_143.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_143.text: If you're looking for another shot, I'm afraid you've missed it.

CRD_Wyll_16.speaker: Player
CRD_Wyll_16.text: Wyll, I'd like you to join me in my bunk tonight.

CRD_Wyll_73.speaker: Player
CRD_Wyll_73.text: I've thought about your offer, and I'm afraid I'm not interested.

CRD_Wyll_38.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_38.context: NodeContext: Player and Wyll are partners. He's horny.

CRD_Wyll_21.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_21.text: Don't keep me waiting, I beg you.
CRD_Wyll_21.context: NodeContext: Player and Wyll are partners. He's horny.

CRD_Wyll_45.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_45.text: There they are - the hero themselves. Let us raise a glass!
CRD_Wyll_45.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll holds a tankard of ale. He is about to propose a toast.NodeContext: Wyll holds a tankard of ale. He is about to propose a toast.

CRD_Wyll_24.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_24.text: To freedom from tyranny! May we hew a clear path for the downtrodden to travel.
CRD_Wyll_24.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll raises his gtlass to toast,NodeContext: Wyll raises his gtlass to toast,

CRD_Wyll_83.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_83.text: To you - a legend in the making.
CRD_Wyll_83.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll keeps his tankard raised.NodeContext: Wyll keeps his tankard raised.

CRD_Wyll_56.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_56.text: And to the Blade! Another wrong righted, another page written!
CRD_Wyll_56.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll lowers his tankarad at the end of the line.NodeContext: Wyll lowers his tankarad at the end of the line.

CRD_Wyll_64.speaker: Player
CRD_Wyll_64.text: 'The Blade' would have very much failed on his own.

CRD_Wyll_65.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_65.text: Cheeky! But let's not sour the evening with talk of maybes and might-have-beens.

CRD_Wyll_30.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_30.text: Already, the bards are preparing their anthems, the poets their verses.

CRD_Wyll_62.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_62.text: Your name will be forever linked to the Blade of Frontiers. Could you have imagined such fortune a tenday ago?

CRD_Wyll_60.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll raises his glass once moreNodeContext: Wyll raises his glass once more

CRD_Wyll_15.speaker: Player
CRD_Wyll_15.text: 'Forever linked?' That isn't 'fortune' - that's a threat.

CRD_Wyll_101.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_101.text: Fuss all you want - this celebration is too sweet for you to sour it!

CRD_Wyll_3.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_3.text: Grab a tankard and suck down some ale. You've an edge in bad need of dulling.

CRD_Wyll_72.speaker: Player
CRD_Wyll_72.text: Wyll, I thought you might want to join me in my bunk tonight...

CRD_Wyll_94.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_94.text: Ah. Well. An intriguing offer, truly, but - I just don't feel that kind of connection.

CRD_Wyll_44.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_44.text: But consider me flattered. A boon for my ego.
CRD_Wyll_44.context: NodeContext: showing a bit of cheeky self-awareness.

CRD_Wyll_70.speaker: Player
CRD_Wyll_70.text: The Blade lives up to his myth!

CRD_Wyll_51.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_51.text: Oh, but the Blade is no myth, chief. Myths are tall tales, fleeting as Cormyrian rain.

CRD_Wyll_48.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_48.text: I'm as real as the heart that beats in your chest. Now go off, have your fun.
CRD_Wyll_48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Takes a drink after his line

CRD_Wyll_87.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_87.text: I've got a tankard keeping me company.

CRD_Wyll_10.speaker: Player
CRD_Wyll_10.text: We should really continue this conversation in my bed.

CRD_Wyll_11.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_11.text: Hmm - I'm not really feeling the connection.

CRD_Wyll_100.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_100.text: But consider me flattered. A boon for my ego.
CRD_Wyll_100.context: NodeContext: showing a bit of cheeky self-awareness.

CRD_Wyll_31.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_31.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flirty. Wyll keeps his tankard raised.Wyll nods and winks  afterwardNodeContext: Flirty. Wyll keeps his tankard raised.

CRD_Wyll_74.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_74.text: May our bond only grow stronger.
CRD_Wyll_74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flirty - with a wink and devious smile. Wyll lowers his tankard.NodeContext: Flirty - with a wink and devious smile. Wyll lowers his tankard.

CRD_Wyll_71.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_71.text: Your heart beats strong, friend. The Blade rarely seeks partnership...

CRD_Wyll_61.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_61.text: ... but the frontier provides few of life's creature comforts.

CRD_Wyll_55.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_55.text: I reckoned our union might extend to your bunk tonight.

CRD_Wyll_93.speaker: Player
CRD_Wyll_93.text: We should explore this bond in my bunk tonight.

CRD_Wyll_33.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_33.text: If I didn't know better, I'd think you were reading my mind.

CRD_Wyll_57.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_57.text: Meet you at your bunk when you're ready.

CRD_Wyll_28.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_28.text: I trust I won't have to wait long.

CRD_Wyll_2.speaker: Player
CRD_Wyll_2.text: Are you coming on to me?

CRD_Wyll_49.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_49.text: I hadn't imagined myself so subtle. Or, to put it another way: yes.

CRD_Wyll_36.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_36.text: Your heart beats strong, friend. The Blade rarely seeks partnership...
CRD_Wyll_36.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll taked a deep drink before speaking.

CRD_Wyll_75.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_75.text: ... but the frontier provides few of life's creature comforts.

CRD_Wyll_25.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_25.text: I reckoned our union might extend to your bunk tonight.

CRD_Wyll_19.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_19.text: Meet you at your bunk when you're ready.

CRD_Wyll_88.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_88.text: Of course, of course. Our future holds countless victories to celebrate.

CRD_Wyll_89.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_89.text: Of course, of course. Why complicate such a valuable friendship?

CRD_Wyll_78.speaker: Player
CRD_Wyll_78.text: We're only allies - and I'd like to keep it that way.

CRD_Wyll_68.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_68.text: Of course, of course. Why complicate such a valuable partnership?

CRD_Wyll_102.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_102.text: And to you and Astarion. May your stars burn ever bright.
CRD_Wyll_102.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll lowers his tankard.NodeContext: Said with a heavy sigh, and a smidgen of jealousy. Wyll lowers his tankard after speaking the line.

CRD_Wyll_92.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_92.text: Consider me jealous as a sisterless hag, then.

CRD_Wyll_18.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_18.text: Eh - go off, have your fun. I've got a tankard keeping me company.

CRD_Wyll_1.speaker: Player
CRD_Wyll_1.text: Cool your blood. I'm not interested in you like that.

CRD_Wyll_77.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_77.text: It's a good thing I'm not jealous then.
CRD_Wyll_77.context: NodeContext: He's such a bad liar.

CRD_Wyll_42.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_42.text: Go off, have your fun. I've got a tankard keeping me company!

CRD_Wyll_96.speaker: Player
CRD_Wyll_96.text: It wouldn't matter one way or another.

CRD_Wyll_53.speaker: Player
CRD_Wyll_53.text: My mind isn't entirely made up. Perhaps you might join me instead.

CRD_Wyll_76.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_76.text: You do know how to set the Blade's heart all a-flutter.

CRD_Wyll_91.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_91.text: When the time comes to rest, just say the word and we'll meet at your bunk.

CRD_Wyll_9.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_9.text: Your heart beats strong, friend. I'm proud to fight at your side.
CRD_Wyll_9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll taked a deep drink before speaking.

CRD_Wyll_7.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_7.text: Now go off, have your fun. I've got a tankard keeping me company.

CRD_Wyll_46.speaker: Player
CRD_Wyll_46.text: The Blade lives up to his myth!

CRD_Wyll_80.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_80.text: Oh, but the Blade is no myth, chief. Myths are tall tales, fleeting as Cormyrian rain.

CRD_Wyll_35.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_35.text: I'm as real as the heart that beats in your chest. Now go off, have your fun.
CRD_Wyll_35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Takes a drink after his line

CRD_Wyll_59.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_59.text: I've got a tankard keeping me company.

CRD_Wyll_13.speaker: Player
CRD_Wyll_13.text: You need to stay out of my business.

CRD_Wyll_23.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_23.text: Your business is plain as a dread pirate's pikestaff, chief.

CRD_Wyll_4.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_4.text: And to you and Gale. May your stars burn ever bright.
CRD_Wyll_4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll lowers his tankard.NodeContext: Said with a heavy sigh, and a smidgen of jealousy. Wyll lowers his tankard after speaking the line.

CRD_Wyll_63.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_63.text: And to you and Karlach. May your stars burn ever bright.
CRD_Wyll_63.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll lowers his tankard.NodeContext: Said with a heavy sigh, and a smidgen of jealousy. Wyll lowers his tankard after speaking the line.

CRD_Wyll_97.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_97.text: And to you and Lae'zel. May your stars burn ever bright.
CRD_Wyll_97.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll lowers his tankard.NodeContext: Said with a heavy sigh, and a smidgen of jealousy. Wyll lowers his tankard after speaking the line.

CRD_Wyll_26.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_26.text: And to you and Shadowheart. May your stars burn ever bright.
CRD_Wyll_26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll lowers his tankard.NodeContext: Said with a heavy sigh, and a smidgen of jealousy. Wyll lowers his tankard after speaking the line.

CRD_Wyll_22.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_22.text: And to you and your paramour. May your stars burn ever bright.
CRD_Wyll_22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll lowers his tankard.NodeContext: Said with a heavy sigh, and a smidgen of jealousy. Wyll lowers his tankard after speaking the line.

CRD_Wyll_47.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_47.context: NodeContext: Wyll rejected player. He's contemplative.

CRD_Wyll_99.speaker: Wyll
CRD_Wyll_99.context: NodeContext: Player rejected Wyll. He's disappointed but kind.

CRD_ROM_Gale_0.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_0.text: Enjoy the night. It seems to me full of opportunities.

CRD_ROM_Gale_46.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gale looks at the player with a big smile and the words are warm and heartfeltNodeContext: You look at the player with a big smile and the words are warm and heartfelt.

CRD_ROM_Gale_96.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_96.text: I'm glad you sought me out. Amid all this merriment I wasn't sure we'd have a chance to speak this evening.

CRD_ROM_Gale_25.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_25.text: Come now! This is a night for celebration, not suspicion.

CRD_ROM_Gale_100.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_100.text: I thank you for seeking me out. Amidst all this merriment I wasn't sure we'd have a chance to speak this evening.

CRD_ROM_Gale_2.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_2.text: I wasn't sure we'd have a chance to make merry, just the two of us.

CRD_ROM_Gale_95.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Gale_95.text: I think that's the wine talking.

CRD_ROM_Gale_52.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_52.text: As they say in Waterdeep: in wine there is truth.

CRD_ROM_Gale_5.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_5.text: That's usually followed by: in water there is good sense.

CRD_ROM_Gale_44.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_44.text: Good sense will have to wait 'til the morrow.

CRD_ROM_Gale_97.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Gale_97.text: Make merry, just the two of us. What would that entail?

CRD_ROM_Gale_88.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_88.text: That, my friend, must remain a secret. For now. Or rather: for as long as you've eyes only for someone else among our troupe.

CRD_ROM_Gale_45.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_45.text: I know there are many things about me that remain shrouded in mystery. You've been very patient with me, and I appreciate that.

CRD_ROM_Gale_7.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_7.text: You've given me powerful magic to consume when I needed it most.

CRD_ROM_Gale_24.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_24.text: You've brought me back from the grey shores of death.

CRD_ROM_Gale_54.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_54.text: You know of my condition, and you know about my unfortunate efforts to win Mystra's favour, but those are but the broad strokes.

CRD_ROM_Gale_39.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_39.text: You know of my condition and its challenges, but those are but the broad strokes.

CRD_ROM_Gale_106.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_106.text: The time has come to paint you the true picture.

CRD_ROM_Gale_99.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Gale_99.text: I have to admit I'm curious.

CRD_ROM_Gale_20.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Gale_20.text: I've waited long enough, haven't I?

CRD_ROM_Gale_28.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_28.text: I can only hope my tale will live up to your expectations.

CRD_ROM_Gale_75.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_75.text: Tonight, of course, we celebrate, and I won't keep you any longer. Tomorrow night though, you're in for quite the bedtime story.

CRD_ROM_Gale_37.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Gale_37.text: What makes you think I still care?

CRD_ROM_Gale_41.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_41.text: Curiosity is a trait we all share.

CRD_ROM_Gale_47.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_47.text: I was given powerful magic to consume when I needed it most.

CRD_ROM_Gale_10.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_10.context: NodeContext: You were about to say "It would entail..." but you stop yourself.

CRD_ROM_Gale_74.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_74.text: Actually, on second thought I can't think of it entailing anything particularly enticing at all.

CRD_ROM_Gale_61.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_61.text: Forgive me, I seem to be of two minds and two moods. We'll blame the wine and leave it at that.

CRD_ROM_Gale_60.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_60.text: We shared a romantic moment of the mind while cloaked in the Weave, didn't we?

CRD_ROM_Gale_76.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_76.text: And I seem to recall a fond allusion to that moment afterwards.

CRD_ROM_Gale_72.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_72.text: Perhaps that's a moment we ought to further explore.

CRD_ROM_Gale_92.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_92.text: We had a moment, you and I, a moment in which we expressed the possibility of becoming more than friends.

CRD_ROM_Gale_21.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_21.text: Tonight seems perfectly suited for such endeavours.

CRD_ROM_Gale_48.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_48.text: Allow me to make the following proposition:

CRD_ROM_Gale_67.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_67.text: There's a book that circulates in Amn, detailing the first thousand nights of a newlywed king and queen.

CRD_ROM_Gale_84.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_84.text: They turned everything they did into an art. The art of conversation. The art of taste, time honoured and newly acquired.

CRD_ROM_Gale_4.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_4.text: The art of the body. The exploration and acceptance of the self and the other. The art of the night itself.

CRD_ROM_Gale_38.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_38.text: I say we take a page from their book.

CRD_ROM_Gale_103.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Gale_103.text: Leave it to you to woo someone with a book.

CRD_ROM_Gale_73.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_73.text: Forget the book then. Let's be blank slates on blank sheets, delightfully new.

CRD_ROM_Gale_32.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Gale_32.text: You're remarkably upfront about your intentions.

CRD_ROM_Gale_57.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_57.text: I'm many things, but coy's not one of them.

CRD_ROM_Gale_83.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Gale_83.text: I'll remind you we're newly acquainted, not newlyweds.

CRD_ROM_Gale_13.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_13.text: Then we'll start writing the prequel.

CRD_ROM_Gale_93.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_93.text: That's because I'm full of delights.

CRD_ROM_Gale_6.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_6.text: We'll let the night run its course. And when everything is quieting down, safe in the arms of sleep, I'll come by to find safety in yours.

CRD_ROM_Gale_36.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Gale_36.text: I'm afraid I have to decline.

CRD_ROM_Gale_16.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_16.text: Too bad. One should never be afraid to live life to the fullest.

CRD_ROM_Gale_69.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Gale_69.text: I'm not sure you're the one I want.

CRD_ROM_Gale_62.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_62.text: That's because you've yet to find out what you're missing.

CRD_ROM_Gale_113.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_113.text: Doubt is a spoilsport. Cast it aside.

CRD_ROM_Gale_8.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Gale_8.text: You're right. I'd like to spend the night with you.

CRD_ROM_Gale_107.speaker: Gale
