CRD_ROM_Gale_107.text: A match made... not quite in heaven, but close enough.

CRD_ROM_Gale_98.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Gale_98.text: Let me stop you right there. That's not something I'm interested in.

CRD_ROM_Gale_30.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_30.text: Merely to share a glass of wine I suppose; to toast to victory and to offer you an invitation.

CRD_ROM_Gale_53.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Gale_53.text: Actually I think I'll go mix and mingle.

CRD_ROM_Gale_35.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_35.text: More's the pity you've already found someone else to make merry with, just the two of you.

CRD_ROM_Gale_50.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_50.text: He has a certain charm about him, Astarion. Then again, so does a tiger when it purrs.

CRD_ROM_Gale_77.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_77.text: You might be in for an adventure with Karlach. More than you bargained for - with a bit of luck.

CRD_ROM_Gale_19.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_19.text: Or perhaps more than you bargained for - full stop.

CRD_ROM_Gale_65.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_65.text: Lae'zel. Blade like a razor, wit like a razor, tongue like a razor.

CRD_ROM_Gale_89.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_89.text: I do hope you know what you're doing.

CRD_ROM_Gale_91.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_91.text: There's something... unspeakable about Shadowheart. But I mean that in a good way. She seems to me like a bud on the cusp of bursting into a rose.

CRD_ROM_Gale_56.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_56.text: Far be it from me of course, to question your tastes.

CRD_ROM_Gale_12.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Gale_12.text: And yet you question them nonetheless.

CRD_ROM_Gale_51.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_51.text: Caught on to that, did you? Might be the wine talking.

CRD_ROM_Gale_85.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Gale_85.text: Do I detect a hint of jealousy?

CRD_ROM_Gale_1.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_1.text: Jealousy is in the eye of the beholder. Or something along those lines, the wine might be befuddling me a smidge.

CRD_ROM_Gale_71.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Gale_71.text: Didn't peg you for a sore loser, Gale.

CRD_ROM_Gale_68.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_68.text: Am I? Perhaps I am. Or perhaps I need another glass of wine.

CRD_ROM_Gale_23.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Gale_23.text: Actually, I may just want to spend the night with you instead of Astarion.

CRD_ROM_Gale_59.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Gale_59.text: Actually, I may just want to spend the night with you instead of Karlach.

CRD_ROM_Gale_26.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Gale_26.text: Actually, I may just want to spend the night with you instead of Lae'zel.

CRD_ROM_Gale_18.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Gale_18.text: Actually, I may just want to spend the night with you instead of Shadowheart.

CRD_ROM_Gale_80.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_80.text: You're all too quick to abandon the one you promised yourself to. That is not a quality I admire.

CRD_ROM_Gale_31.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_31.text: No, I was glad you sought me out for an entirely different reason:

CRD_ROM_Gale_15.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_15.text: I'm sorry, but surely we're friends, allies, the best of companions, but... no more than that.

CRD_ROM_Gale_82.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_82.text: No, I was glad you sought me out for an entirely different reason: to toast to victory and to offer you an invitation.

CRD_ROM_Gale_27.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Gale_27.text: Actually, I may just want to spend the night with you instead of Wyll.

CRD_ROM_Gale_111.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_111.text: Wyll's a good man. He may actually be a tried-and-true storybook hero.

CRD_ROM_Gale_33.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_33.text: Then again he's so full of himself it's a small miracle he hasn't resorted to self-cannibalism yet.

CRD_ROM_Gale_81.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_81.text: I've said enough. Let silence do the talking.

CRD_ROM_Gale_101.speaker: Gale
CRD_ROM_Gale_101.text: There's promise in patience, I assure you. Let the night run its course so that we can run ours as well.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_40.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_40.text: Have a laugh, make some noise. I'll be my charming self before you know it.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_52.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_52.text: Agh, Hells! I was hoping you wouldn't notice I was gone.
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_52.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player approaches Wyll, who is lost in thought. He is visibly startled to see you appear.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_112.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_112.text: Oh, I'm deeply proud of you. A touch less so of myself.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_108.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_108.text: Of course I noticed. It was no party without you.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_124.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_124.text: What exactly do you think you're doing sulking out here? Get your arse back to the party!

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_176.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_176.text: Ha! Oh, the Blade doesn't sulk. I was just reflecting on what has happened, and not wanting to be Mister Serious at a celebration.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_84.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_84.text: Sounds like some pretty words for sulking to me!

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_120.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_120.text: I can say it even more nicely.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_148.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_148.text: I'm, ahem, soberly pondering my state of affairs, and not wishing to drag a single happy soul into a state of melancholy.
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_148.context: NodeContext: Making fun of his own sulking

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_130.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_130.text: Oh shush. Let yourself have fun.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_21.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_21.text: I know how to have fun! I have lots of fun every day!

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_19.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_19.text: Saving the people of the grove was all the satisfaction I could ask.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_38.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_38.text: I don't need a party on top of that!

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_69.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_69.text: In truth, I don't feel in a festive mood, and didn't want to cast a grey cloud over the night.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_62.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_62.text: I'm a devil. I love the people from the grove, but I unsettle them deep down.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_77.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_77.text: As I seem to unsettle everyone nowadays.
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_77.context: NodeContext: Wyll seems truly mournful, just for one moment.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_98.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_98.text: You don't want a devil at your party.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_162.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_162.text: Horns this sharp will pop the balloons, you see. And the guests won't take kindly to scars quite so monstrous.
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_162.context: NodeContext: Very jovially, trying to make light of the situation

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_83.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_83.text: To our kind, those features just make you more attractive.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_154.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_154.text: You pull them off far more finely than I do.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_23.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_23.text: You don't unsettle me, you know that.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_160.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_160.text: If only half the world had half the heart you do.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_121.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_121.text: You just have some fetching horns! I'm envious.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_67.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_67.text: Ouch! You don't need to mock me when I'm feeling low.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_147.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_147.text: Come on, you're exaggerating. Not that much has changed.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_26.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_26.text: I feel spikes beginning to sprout in places they really shouldn't.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_93.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_93.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll realises he may have been better off not revealing that.NodeContext: Embarrassed

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_46.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_46.text: Sorry it has you feeling rough tonight.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_133.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_133.text: Ah, I'll be fine. Seeing you has cheered me more than you can know.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_164.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_164.text: We've saved the grove, and everyone hails us as heroes.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_60.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_60.text: For you, it's as clear as cool water you have that heroism within you.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_167.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_167.text: But Karlach is dead, and Gods know how many other of my victims were people like her.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_125.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_125.text: I shouldn't be celebrated tonight. That's why I left.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_105.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_105.text: Don't beat yourself up. We are doing the best we can, together.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_72.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_72.text: But off with you. This is your day! Have a dance. Enjoy the music.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_178.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_178.text: I want to dance with you.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_51.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_51.text: Ha! In truth, I always enjoyed a bit of pomp.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_45.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_45.text: I once beat the Baldurian record for the most sarabandes danced in a single evening.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_156.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_156.text: Much to the exhaustion of the good ladies and gentlemen of the Gate.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_99.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_99.text: I imagine you're fairly skilled with your form, too. That would be a sight to behold.
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_99.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll looks you up and down.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_58.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_58.text: I had years of lessons but in truth, it's all about your partner.
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_58.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll eyes you up and down.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_70.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_70.text: You cut quite a fine figure. I can just imagine leading you with an entire ballroom watching.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_8.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_8.text: But who am I fooling? I can't go back to that life.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_158.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_158.text: If not a dance, then maybe a kiss.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_59.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_59.text: If not a dance, then maybe a kiss.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_17.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_17.text: Maybe another time. Now, you've got a party to get back to. Don't forget, tonight is about you.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_144.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_144.text: Why not? You never know what the future holds.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_81.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_81.text: Too many reasons to count. I might share them someday.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_175.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_175.text: Maybe we could pretend. Just for one night.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_63.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_63.text: But not tonight. Tonight is about you.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_95.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_95.text: I would give anything to have seen it.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_82.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_82.text: Aw, by Balduran's elbow, I can't stay feeling gloomy with you looking at me like that.
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_82.context: CinematicNodeContext: A moment of quiet passes between Wyll and Tav. Tav looks expectantly towards Wyll.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_138.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_138.text: You have a vow from the Blade. He will show you a wonderful time, another night.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_36.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_36.text: I'm afraid my feet are firmly planted to the ground this evening.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_117.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_117.text: Can't you tell why I really followed you out here?

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_143.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_143.text: Clearly to practice your forest tracking.
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_143.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll plays dumb in a little game with the player for this sectionNodeContext: Jokingly, and trying to avoid talking about what he knows is obvious

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_12.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_12.text: I love the way your nose wrinkles up when you get the scent of a lead for the first time.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_31.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_31.text: Clearly Mol has put you up to stealing my britches so you can turn them into a flag for her gang.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_161.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_161.text: You must have stumbled out here by complete accident.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_132.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_132.text: Too much honey-wine can do that. You should watch yourself.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_172.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_172.text: Actually, I thought I might steal a kiss.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_180.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_180.text: Actually, I thought I might steal a kiss.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_135.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_135.text: Oh! I will safeguard my undergarments with care.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_89.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_89.text: Let me think... Why are you really here?
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_89.context: NodeContext: Very clearly teasing you flirtily

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_13.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_13.text: You must be Volo in disguise, out here to harangue me for some tales of the Frontiers.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_152.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_152.text: What a cruel disguise! My nerves started hammering the second I thought they were the one looking for me.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_97.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_97.text: Karlach got lusty at the party, didn't she?

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_137.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_137.text: She's started a huge fire, and you're trying to save my life.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_111.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_111.text: You're running away from Gale's cooking.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_118.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_118.text: It's delicious, don't get me wrong, but that man wouldn't eat a vegetable unless Mystra herself commanded it.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_37.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_37.text: You were hoping for some peace and quiet out in the forest, and I have ruined your night entirely.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_57.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_57.text: Why else? There couldn't be another reason.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_55.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_55.text: I better come clean - I wanted a kiss.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_179.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_179.text: I better come clean - I wanted a kiss.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_74.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_74.text: It's a long shot, but - maybe you've grown fond of me. Gods know I've grown fond of you.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_48.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_48.text: Damn right I'm fond of you.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_53.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_53.text: Gods know why. You'd be well within your rights to burn me alive.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_169.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_169.text: Well, it just so happens I'm fond of you too.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_134.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_134.text: Then we share a similar affliction. For I've grown fond of you too.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_14.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_14.text: Though I can't say I've earned the honour.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_165.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_165.text: I haven't even managed to kill one measly devil. I'm hardly a prime catch.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_88.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_88.text: The world spits on those partial to devils. I'm hardly a prime catch.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_140.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_140.text: Maybe a kiss would prove my affections.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_96.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_96.text: *Sigh.* You drive a hard bargain. But just the one.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_87.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Wyll share a quick kiss.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_126.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_126.text: I - well, then. Erm, you've got a party to get back to. After all, tonight is about you.
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_126.context: CinematicNodeContext: Smiling and slightly embarrassed. Tall player version.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_145.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_145.text: There will be another time for us.
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_145.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Wyll places his hand on Tav's shoulder. Tall playert player

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_47.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Wyll stoops to share a quick kiss.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_86.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_86.text: I - well, then. Erm, you've got a party to get back to. After all, tonight is about you.
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_86.context: CinematicNodeContext: Smiling and slightly embarrassed. Short player version.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_33.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_33.text: There will be another time for us.
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_33.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Wyll places his hand on Tav's shoulder. Short player

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_43.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_43.text: A kiss? Well - I can't say I'm not tempted. But not here, not now.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_177.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_177.text: Maybe a kiss would prove my affections.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_94.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_94.text: That's not true. You're an incredible person, Wyll.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_7.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_7.text: I'm not sure that I am. But it means something that you think so.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_155.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_155.text: Now, you've got a party to get back to. Don't forget, tonight is about you.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_171.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_171.text: You don't need to be the Blade of Frontiers for me, just be yourself.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_122.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_122.text: The Blade is my best self. On my best days, I've even lived up to the name.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_28.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_28.text: Oh! Seems I stumbled ahead of myself. Wouldn't be the first time.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_153.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_153.text: Some time alone beneath the stars, and I'll be back to my old self. Promise.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_76.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_76.text: Still - it's a night to remember. You've made sure of that.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_131.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_131.text: I mean - the Blade hasn't exactly lived up to his own reputation.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_56.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_56.text: You have many talents, but subtlety isn't one of them.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_110.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_110.text: I just wanted to see if my friend was all right, nothing more.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_92.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_92.text: Because I like you. And I want to know you better.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_22.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_22.text: I just wanted a quick chat. I'll leave you to it.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_68.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_68.text: Thanks. It's good to know someone's looking out.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_3.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_3.text: I like you, Wyll. And I want to know you better.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_6.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_6.text: I just wanted to check up on you, that's all.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_80.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_80.text: If so, I'm afraid I must remain a passing fancy. If not, well, it wouldn't be my first misjudgement.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_64.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_64.text: It's a long shot, but - maybe you've grown fond of me.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_9.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_9.text: I wish you were there, but I'll respect your need for peace.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_102.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_102.text: Twelve impossible deeds every day before the sun reaches its apex.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_170.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_170.text: That's the way of the Blade.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_174.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_174.text: What can I do to cheer you up?

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_90.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_90.text: Don't complain. We're all still alive, aren't we?

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_136.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_136.text: You're safe another day. Really, that should be enough.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_2.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_2.text: These people are still in danger.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_141.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_141.text: Karlach, the creature from Hell, will still threaten them. As will a thousand other perils.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_109.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_109.text: These people are still in danger. A thousand perils still threaten them.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_35.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_35.text: They aren't ready to get on the road on their own.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_29.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_29.text: We have won this day! Danger is for tomorrow.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_54.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_54.text: Your words cheer me more than any party could.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_44.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_44.text: You're right, but we need to give them hope.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_34.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_34.text: You're good at it. You've given me some just by being here.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_85.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_85.text: Have some faith. Whatever happens, they'll survive it.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_5.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_5.text: If only faith was enough to ward off every bully of the wilds.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_78.speaker: Player
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_78.text: So? If they die, they die. That's life for you.

CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_25.speaker: Wyll
CRD_ROM_Wyll_PostEA_25.text: We all die. But life's still worth the living. Otherwise, what's the point of it?
